member.summary: Default constructor.

member.summary: This constructor initializes the file reference instance by capturing the relative and absolute paths to the specified file.

Input filename to set

member.summary: Converts and returns the value of this instance to its equivalent string representation.

Input filename to set

member.summary: This class acts as a wrapper to a folder reference.

member.summary: This constructor initializes a new instance of the DxFolder class.
member.param: Input the folder reference
Input a wildcard string used for matching filenames
Input a value of true to include subfolders
Input a value of true to enable wildcard matching
Input a value of true to enable the live folder option

member.summary: Accesses the wildcard pattern used for matching filenames.

member.summary: Assesses whether subfolders are included or not.

member.summary: Assesses whether wildcard matching is enabled or not.

member.summary: Assesses whether the live folder option is enabled or not.

member.summary: Default constructor.

member.summary: This class contains settings that will be used by the data extractor object.

member.name: M:Autodesk.AutoCAD.DataExtraction.DxDrawingDataExtractorSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: P:Autodesk.AutoCAD.DataExtraction.DxDrawingDataExtractorSettings.DrawingList
member.summary: Accesses a list of drawings from which the data will be extracted.

member.name: P:Autodesk.AutoCAD.DataExtraction.DxDrawingDataExtractorSettings.SelectedTypesAndProperties
member.summary: Accesses the list of types and properties that will be extracted.

member.name: P:Autodesk.AutoCAD.DataExtraction.DxDrawingDataExtractorSettings.ExtractFlags
member.summary: Accesses flags which control how the extraction will be performed.

member.name: T:Autodesk.AutoCAD.DataExtraction.DxDrawingDataExtractor
member.summary: This class represents the actual data extraction engine.

member.name: M:Autodesk.AutoCAD.DataExtraction.DxDrawingDataExtractor.DiscoverTypesAndProperties(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes the current extractor engine by scanning the drawing database(s) specified in the Settings property.
member.param: Input the path that will be used for resolving relative file paths. Typically, this is the path to the DXE file

member.name: M:Autodesk.AutoCAD.DataExtraction.DxDrawingDataExtractor.ExtractData(System.String)
member.summary: Starts the data extraction. The result is stored in the ExtractedData property of this class.
member.param: Input the path which will be used for resolving relative file paths. Typically this is the path to the DXE file

member.name: P:Autodesk.AutoCAD.DataExtraction.DxDrawingDataExtractor.DiscoveredTypesAndProperties
member.summary: Accesses the collection of data types that were discovered after calling the DiscoverTypesAndProperties() method.

member.name: P:Autodesk.AutoCAD.DataExtraction.DxDrawingDataExtractor.ExtractedData
member.summary: Stores the extracted data after calling the ExtractData() method.

member.name: P:Autodesk.AutoCAD.DataExtraction.DxDrawingDataExtractor.Settings
member.summary: Accesses the current settings that will be used to perform the data extraction.
